<h3 id="X38224">X(38224) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(13), X(14)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^8-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+(3*b^4-b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^4-(b^2+c^2)*(3*b^4-5*b^2*c^2+3*c^4)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^4  :  :
<b><br>
X(38224) = 4*X(2)-X(8724) = 2*X(2)+X(11632) = 5*X(2)+X(12243) = X(3)+2*X(115) = X(3)-4*X(6036) = 2*X(3)+X(6321) = X(3)+8*X(20398) = X(115)+2*X(6036) = 4*X(115)-X(6321) = X(115)-4*X(20398) = X(8724)+2*X(11632) = 5*X(8724)+4*X(12243) = X(8724)+4*X(14651) = X(8724)-8*X(34127) = 5*X(11632)-2*X(12243) = X(11632)+4*X(34127) = X(12243)-5*X(14651) = 2*X(12243)+5*X(15561) = X(12243)+10*X(34127) = 2*X(14651)+X(15561) = X(14651)+2*X(34127) = X(15561)-4*X(34127)
</b>
<p>
Let Q be the cyclic quadrilateral ABCX(98). Taking the vertices 3 at a time yields four triangles whose nine-point centers are the vertices of a cyclic quadrilateral homothetic to Q at X(38224).  (Randy Hutson, May 19, 2020)
</p>
<p>
X(38224) lies on these lines: {2,2782}, {3,115}, {4,12042}, {5,83}, {11,10053}, {12,10069}, {13,6774}, {14,6771}, {20,22515}, {30,9166}, {35,13183}, {36,13182}, {99,140}, {110,15535}, {114,1656}, {125,15545}, {147,3090}, {148,631}, {182,11646}, {230,2080}, {265,15359}, {355,11710}, {381,2794}, {498,3027}, {499,3023}, {511,6034}, {517,38220}, {542,5050}, {543,5054}, {546,10722}, {547,6054}, {549,671}, {550,10723}, {575,7603}, {597,19905}, {620,3526}, {632,23235}, {690,15061}, {1385,13178}, {1482,11725}, {1569,31455}, {1576,34989}, {2023,3095}, {2072,13557}, {2482,15694}, {2548,12829}, {2784,10175}, {2796,38068}, {3091,9862}, {3311,8980}, {3312,13967}, {3523,13172}, {3524,26614}, {3534,9880}, {3541,5186}, {3542,12131}, {3589,12177}, {3628,7859}, {3654,12258}, {3788,13108}, {3851,10991}, {3933,8781}, {4027,16921}, {4045,35464}, {4193,5985}, {4995,10070}, {5025,10104}, {5056,5984}, {5070,6721}, {5071,11177}, {5182,38110}, {5298,10054}, {5309,32447}, {5432,10086}, {5433,10089}, {5465,20126}, {5469,21156}, {5470,21157}, {5475,11842}, {5613,6669}, {5617,6670}, {5690,7983}, {5901,7970}, {5976,32832}, {5986,37990}, {6230,6289}, {6231,6290}, {6248,7886}, {6684,11599}, {6699,16278}, {6777,20416}, {6778,20415}, {7529,9861}, {7583,19055}, {7584,19056}, {7607,7771}, {7612,16041}, {7741,12185}, {7769,32448}, {7785,36864}, {7797,11272}, {7806,10796}, {7951,12184}, {8227,9860}, {8591,15702}, {8596,15721}, {8981,19109}, {9722,37893}, {9734,11648}, {9830,38064}, {9864,9956}, {10242,14041}, {10264,15342}, {10303,20094}, {10352,32992}, {10359,33002}, {10576,35825}, {10577,35824}, {10753,18583}, {10769,33814}, {10992,15720}, {11005,20304}, {11676,14693}, {12100,12117}, {12355,15693}, {13174,31423}, {13349,23005}, {13350,23004}, {13966,19108}, {14160,14537}, {14568,32515}, {14880,37446}, {15059,22265}, {15597,16508}, {15699,23234}, {15723,22247}, {18502,20576}, {26316,37348}</p>
<p>
X(38224) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 14651}, {671, 21166}, {5469, 21156}, {5470, 21157}, {6055, 23514}, {11632, 15561}, {14041, 21445}, {14639, 34473}, {14643, 14849}<br>
X(38224) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (2, 34127), (381, 23514), (3524, 26614), (5055, 14971), (5182, 38110), (8724, 15561), (10242, 14041), (11632, 14651), (14639, 38229), (15561, 2), (21166, 549), (23234, 15699), (23514, 5461)<br>
X(38224) = X(6321)-Gibert-Moses centroid<br>
X(38224) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 11632, 8724), (3, 115, 6321), (5, 98, 6033), (98, 14061, 5), (114, 6722, 1656), (114, 11623, 12188), (115, 6036, 3), (125, 18332, 15545), (125, 33511, 18332), (148, 631, 33813), (230, 15980, 2080), (381, 6055, 14830), (1656, 12188, 114), (3526, 13188, 620), (5461, 6055, 381), (6036, 20398, 115), (6722, 11623, 114), (9166, 14639, 38229), (9166, 34473, 14639), (14651, 34127, 15561), (15092, 22505, 3091), (20415, 25560, 6778), (20416, 25559, 6777), (22510, 22511, 6034)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
